metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0286 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. A null pointer dereference inbond_ipsec_add_sa() may lead to local denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
